review: I shouldn't say I cannot live without it, air, food and water are things I can't live without. With that being said this is definitely one of my favorite gadgets. Hook up was extremely simple, I just plugged it in. Navigation is simple as well. The remote isn't complicated and the home page is simple and functional. The voice option is really good too. It picked up what my 3 year old was requesting.The Amazon Fire TV is so easy to use that my 3 year old was able to find a purchase a movie that he wanted while unsupervised for a few minutes. We are enjoying more freedom in watching TV and actually cut down on satellite.
